entry.title: Friday: Periods of light snow. High minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow this morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 27 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 7:56 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Clear. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: Clear. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 7:56 AM MDT Friday 14 April 2023
